Isha Yoga Center Retreat

Isha Yoga Center â€“ Sacred Space for Self Transformation
 

A powerful space consecrated for inner unfoldment, having a deeply dedicated community which is an embodiment of love and commitment to all.

Dear ,

We would like to invite you to join the next Isha Yoga Center Retreat. This is an opportunity to visit and experience five nights in the consecrated space of the Isha Yoga Center, a sacred space for self-transformation.

A volunteer will accompany and guide those joining this retreat, right from Singapore Airport to the Isha Yoga Center and back. The retreat will also include an opportunity to participate in the Pancha Bhuta Aradhana, a process for purifying the five elements within the human system.

Highlights:
  • Accompaniment by a volunteer, from Singapore to the Center and back
  • Shared accommodation (5 nights) in comfortable AC Cottages, in a consecrated space
  • Provision of wholesome vegetarian meals (twice a day)
  • Guided introduction to the Center by trained residents
  • Participation in the Pancha Bhuta Aradhana
  • Dedicated space for daily sadhana
  • Trained teachers for guiding and correcting practices
Dates & Registration
 
  • Depart Singapore on Sunday night, June 18th
  • Return to Singapore on Saturday morning, June 24th
Cost:
  • Nominal Cost of $1,250 SGD
  • Early Bird Offer of $1,100 SGD (register by April 24th)
Register
Please Note:
  • There are limited seats and registration closes on May 18th
  • Registration may close earlier (if places fill sooner)
  • Price for children will be the same as that of adults
  • Once payment is received & processed, confirmation of registration will be sent
  • Further details from registered participants will be requested at later date.
  • Contact Jeannie @ 97371918 for any further clarifications
  • Early Bird Offer of $1,100 SGD (register by April 24th)
Cancellation Policy:
  • Please note that after the flight tickets are booked, there will be no refund.
Retreat Includes:
  • Onwards and return flight tickets, via most comfortable available flights
  • Transfer between Airport and Isha Yoga Center (both ways), by shared vehicle
  • Accommodation in shared AC rooms
  • Wholesome vegetarian meals (twice a day)
  • Participation in Pancha Bhuta Aradhana
Retreat Excludes:
  • Visa to India (has to be arranged by participants themselves)
  • Please note that this shouldn't be an e-Visa
  • Sightseeing at other locations or shopping in an Indian City

This is a process offered every Shivaratri at the Dhyanalinga to purify the five elements within the human system. The basis of all creation, including the physical body, is the five elements. The wellbeing of the body and mind can be determined by the purity of the five elements within the human system. This purification process also shapes the body to become a stepping-stone towards one's ultimate wellbeing, rather than remain a hurdle to oneâ€™s growth.
